Package net.apartium.cocoabeans.scoreboard

Class CocoaBoard

java.lang.Object
net.apartium.cocoabeans.scoreboard.CocoaBoard
@AvailableSince("0.0.39") public abstract class CocoaBoard extends Object
CocoaBoard is an easier way to work with scoreboard Support the Observable api that let you make dynamic data change by itself without worrying about it CocoaBoard support multiple server software like (paper, minestom) CocoaBoard could be for a couple of players or single player also you can change between them

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    protected static class 
    CocoaBoard.ComponentEntry
    Component Entry wrapper around observable to be able to flag dirty and see Kif need to be updated

  • Constructor Details

    • CocoaBoard

      protected CocoaBoard(String objectiveId, net.apartium.cocoabeans.state.Observable<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> title, boolean isCustomScoreSupported)
      Constructor for CocoaBoard
      Parameters:
      objectiveId - scoreboard objective id (Should be unique to support player receiving multiple CocoaBoard)
      title - title of the scoreboard
      isCustomScoreSupported - whether the version support custom score display or not note: If you implement call CocoaBoard#createBoardAndDisplay

    • line

      public void line(int line, net.kyori.adventure.text.Component component, net.kyori.adventure.text.Component scoreDisplay, net.kyori.adventure.text.format.Style numberStyle)
      Set a line in the scoreboard with simple component & scoreDisplay or custom numberStyle
      Parameters:
      line - line number (0 is the top)
      component - the static content
      scoreDisplay - custom score display - Note: (+1.20.3)
      numberStyle - the side number style if scoreDisplay is null - Note: (+1.20.3) note: If scoreDisplay & numberStyle are null will be blank instead of number - Note: (+1.20.3)

    • line

      public void line(int line, net.apartium.cocoabeans.state.Observable<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> component, net.apartium.cocoabeans.state.Observable<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> scoreDisplay, net.kyori.adventure.text.format.Style numberStyle)
      Set a line in the scoreboard with simple component & scoreDisplay or custom numberStyle
      Parameters:
      line - line number (0 is the top)
      component - the observable content
      scoreDisplay - custom score display - Note: (+1.20.3)
      numberStyle - the side number style if scoreDisplay is null - Note: (+1.20.3) note: If scoreDisplay & numberStyle are null will be blank instead of number - Note: (+1.20.3)
